description: A set of questions to test the software with
name: Test MQF

questions.question: 203. Loading the GPS keys improves FFS performance.
204. Maximum troop door opening airspeed is _____.
205. Static line personnel airdrops over the ramp are ____
responses: Authorized for specifically designated Air Force units.
Authorized for specifically designated Navy units.
horized only when done in conjunction with boat drops.

questions.question: 206. If the crosstrack error abeam the CARP/HARP is predicted to be greater than at any time during usable DZ time, the CAWS annunciates "AUTO DROP," and the AUTO DROP annunciator on the instrument panel illuminates.
